results.overview: Explore the highs and lows of growing up in the spotlight through the lens of some of the world’s most famous former child stars. Through celebrity interviews, verite scenes, and archival footage, this film deconstructs the stages of earlier stardom and looks at the entertainment system over the last century.
results.title: Child Star

results.overview: An inside account of President Trump's challenge to the results of the 2020 presidential election as told by former White House staff and appointees, including former Attorney General William Barr, and elected Republican officials in Arizona and Georgia who resisted pressure to change the results of the vote in their states.
results.title: Stopping the Steal

results.overview: The forests of Michoacán are home to millions of monarch butterflies. Activist Homero Gómez was highly vocal about its preservation – and then he vanished.
results.title: The Guardian of the Monarchs

results.overview: Matt Walsh goes deep undercover in the world of diversity, equity, and inclusion. Prepare to be shocked by how far race hustlers will go and how much further Matt Walsh will go to expose the grift, uncovering absurdities that will leave you laughing.
results.title: Am I Racist?

results.overview: Comedian Katt Williams lets loose in real time as he hits the stage for Netflix's second livestreamed stand-up event.
results.title: Katt Williams: Woke Foke

results.overview: A behind-the-scenes featurette explaining the process to make new Coraline puppets fifteen years after the film's release.
results.title: Rebuilding Coraline

results.original_title: Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwarts
results.overview: An enchanting making-of story told through all-new in-depth interviews and cast conversations, inviting fans on a magical first-person journey through one of the most beloved film franchises of all time.
results.title: Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwarts

results.original_title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
results.overview: The evolution of adult cinema through the most influential films in history, a journey that begins in the 1970s and ends nowadays. An in-depth analysis of the success of the most prestigious erotic films, their impact on industry and society, and their influence on cinema and contemporary culture.
results.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time

results.original_title: 13 หมูป่า: เรื่องเล่าจากในถ้ำ
results.overview: In this compelling documentary, members of the Thai youth soccer team tell their stories of getting trapped in Tham Luang Cave in 2018 — and surviving.
results.title: The Trapped 13: How We Survived The Thai Cave

results.overview: Actor Christopher Reeve rises to stardom when he lands the role of Superman in the 1970s. When a horse-riding accident leaves him paralyzed in 1995, Reeve spends the rest of his life searching for a cure for spinal cord injuries.
results.title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story

results.overview: Follow a multi-generational orangutan family through their treetop triumphs and travails in this immersive documentary narrated by David Attenborough.
results.title: Secret Lives of Orangutans

results.original_title: Inside the Mind of a Dog
results.overview: Embark on a delightful journey into the world of dogs in this documentary that reveals scientific and emotional insights about our lovable BFFs.
results.title: Inside the Mind of a Dog

results.overview: In the remote village of El Echo that exists outside of time, the children care for the sheep and their elders. While the frost and drought punish the land, they learn to understand death, illness and love with each act, word and silence of their parents. A story about the echo of what clings to the soul, about the certainty of shelter provided by those around us, about rebellion and vertigo in the face of life. About growing up.
results.title: The Echo

results.overview: Using original footage and interviews, this documentary tells the nail-biting story of Apollo 13 and the struggle to bring its astronauts safely home.
results.title: Apollo 13: Survival

results.overview: Observational documentary unlocking the doors of Britain's hidden swinging scene via access to one of the country's most popular swinging clubs and candid interviews with the club's founder, staff and clientele.
results.title: Swingers
